name: brotkrueml/schema
description: API and view helpers for schema.org markup

suggest.typo3/cms-adminpanel: Display schema.org types and properties on a page in Admin Panel
suggest.brotkrueml/schema-auto: Provides additional terms related to auto
suggest.brotkrueml/schema-bib: Provides additional terms related to bibliography
suggest.brotkrueml/schema-health: Provides additional terms related to health and lifesciences
suggest.brotkrueml/schema-pending: Provides pending terms which have yet to be accepted into the core vocabulary
suggest.brotkrueml/schema-rector: Instant upgrade and refactoring for the TYPO3 schema extension code by using Rector
suggest.brotkrueml/schema-virtuallocation: Provides pending type VirtualLocation for events

scripts.zip: grep -Po "(?<='version' => ')([0-9]+\.[0-9]+\.[0-9]+)" ext_emconf.php | xargs -I {version} sh -c 'mkdir -p ../zip; git archive -v -o "../zip/${PWD##*/}_{version}.zip" v{version}'
